name: Shootout Heroes
description:
Climb through the leagues and evolve your skills to become the best shooter and goalkeeper.Play in a series of 5 chance shootout matches against the computer or other players in a retro styled game based on penalty shootouts games seen on mobile phones.

FEATURES

>A multiplayer game with up to 8 players simultaneously (not online).

>Career with 4 leagues with promotions/relegations and a cup.

>Top scorers and keepers lists.

>Easy to learn,hard to master,your skill and reflexes counts.

TIPS

>Use WASD+SPACE or CURSOR+RCONTROL or GAMEPAD. 

>SHOOTING>press fire to add shot height and left or right to add ball spin.

>SAVING>move with direction keys and fire to jump.

>GAME>press 'delete' in main menu to clear selected save slot. 

>Your skills will increase or decrease based in your skill in matches.

>The shooting skill controls your shooting power,spin and timer. 

>The saving skill controls your movement speed,jump distance and compass speed.

CREDITS
